title.en: A Prayer to Overcome Invading Forces

text.en: Through the power of the truth of the Three Jewels and the oceanic Three Roots,
text.en-trans: könchok tsa sum gyatsö den tob dang

text.en: Especially the vidyādhara Dorje Drakpo Tsal,
May all their power, force and strength blaze forth like apocalyptic flames
text.en-trans: tutob nüpa kalpé mé zhin bor

text.en: To burn away the invading forces of the Red Army until none remains.
May the machinations of these barbarians vanish like water poured on sand,
text.en-trans: lalö dün drö jema chu luk zhin

text.en: And may they be naturally subdued, rendered powerless, so that the teachings of the victorious Buddha,
text.en-trans: nümé rang zhi gyur né gyalwé ten

text.en: Together with all the ranks of those who uphold them, remain intact and unscathed.
text.en-trans: dé dzin dé dang chepa nö tsedral

text.en: Grant your blessings so that this aspiration may be fulfilled according to our wishes.
